title: American Ghost Trip - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/31/22
itunes:title: American Ghost Trip - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/31/22
description:
George Noory and author Richard Estep explore his haunted road trip across America to investigate haunted hospitals, graveyards and other sites in Iowa, Indiana, Gettysburg and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
